name: VietMapsGeocoder
summary: VietMaps Geocoding API for Swift and Objective-C.
description: VietMapsGeocoder makes it easy to connect your iOS, macOS, tvOS, or watchOS application to the VietMaps Geocoding API. VietMapsGeocoder exposes the power of the Carmen geocoder through a simple API similar to Core Locationâ€™s CLGeocoder.
